```py
error: literal out of range for `i8`
  |
4 |     let a = 255 as i8;
  |             ^^^
  |
  = note: the literal `255` does not fit into the type `i8` 
          whose range is `-128..=127`
  = help: consider using the type `u8` instead
  = note: `#[deny(overflowing_literals)]` on by default 
```
